project_plan.name: Python Multiple-Choice Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. All questions and answers will be stored in a variable within the code.

task.name: Define questions and answers variable in the code
Implement the functionality to display questions and options to the user
Implement user input handling to capture the selected answer
Implement score tracking for correct answers
Implement functionality to display the final score at the end of the quiz
Write tests for each of the functionalities implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
